output.sentences: While visiting local places, John took a pic of me standing outside of the Mormon visitors center.
On the sidewalk, we were late for the next event so we began jogging.
We headed toward the temple location.
That temple was so pretty at night.
We wanted a temple picture, and spent the rest of the night searching the best angle.
